thread.title: Pennsylvania woman sues Cosby, alleges defamation, sex abuse
thread.title_full: Pennsylvania woman sues Cosby, alleges defamation, sex abuse

title: Pennsylvania woman sues Cosby, alleges defamation, sex abuse
text:
> Pennsylvania Pennsylvania woman sues Cosby, alleges defamation, sex abuse Renita Hill, who appeared on an educational children's TV show as a teenager with Bill Cosby in the 1980's, gives a statement during a news conference about a lawsuit against Cosby, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, in Pittsburgh. Hill claims he defamed her after she gave an interview claiming he sexually abused her in the 1980's. (AP Photo/Keith Srakocic) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
